content: **knitted mittens with nordic pattern in drops lima ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern li-183 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m l/xl circumference approx 21-23 cm full length approx 23-24 cm hand-length approx 18-19 cm thumb-gusset length approx 7-7 cm length from gusset to finger tip approx 11-12 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 2923 goldenrod 50-50 g colour 0100 off white **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with nordic pattern on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
